ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): form = widget.ProviderWidget if (form == None) : return
entity = form.Entity if (entity == None) : return
widget.Hidden = (entity["CONTRIBUICAOPREVIDENCIARIA"].GetDBValue() == "S") or (entity["PIS"].GetDBValue() == "N" and entity["COFINS"].GetDBValue() == "N")
